description: I'm living a very content, drama-free life and I'm not looking to be saved, or for someone to make me happy (what a huge responsibility to put on someone!). I'd just love to find a best friend to hang out with, do things with, go sight seeing with, go for walks with, go for coffee with etc. Preferably self-aware, someone always growing and learning as a person so they understand others' better, always wanting to be the best version of a human being they can be. :-)
